Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.text.rules.IWhitespaceDetector

Packages that use IWhitespaceDetector
Package
Description
org.eclipse.jface.text.rules
Provides a framework for rule based text scanning and uses the framework to provide rule-driven default implementations of IPresentationDamager, IPresentationRepairer and IDocumentPartitioner.

  • Uses of IWhitespaceDetector in org.eclipse.jface.text.rules

    Fields in org.eclipse.jface.text.rules declared as IWhitespaceDetector
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected IWhitespaceDetector
    WhitespaceRule.fDetector
    The whitespace detector used by this rule
    Constructors in org.eclipse.jface.text.rules with parameters of type IWhitespaceDetector
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    WhitespaceRule(IWhitespaceDetector detector)
    Creates a rule which, with the help of an whitespace detector, will return Token.WHITESPACE when a whitespace is detected.
     
    WhitespaceRule(IWhitespaceDetector detector, IToken token)
    Creates a rule which, with the help of an whitespace detector, will return the given whitespace token when a whitespace is detected.
